[ Show abstract ] [ Hide abstract ] ABSTRACT : The Chinese language possesses linguistic properties that are distinct from those of the most widely studied European languages .Given such uniqueness , research on the neurocognitive processing of Chinese not only contributes to our understanding of language - specific cognitive processes but also sheds light on the universality of psycholinguistic models developed on the basis of these European languages .
